mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing Witness History III The Twang Years featuring Duane Eddy, John Fogerty, Willie Nelson, Peter Frampton, Marty Stuart, and Bonnie Bramlett at the Ryman Auditorium on April 5. Poster features woodcuts of stars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
